itemDescription: British schoolteacher; Headmistress of North London Collegiate School

wikipedia_page.main: Dame Katherine Anderson,  (4 July 1903 – 15 July 1979), known as Kitty Anderson, was a British schoolteacher. She was headmistress of the North London Collegiate School from 1945 to 1965.

response: * Dame Kitty Anderson (1903–1979), former Headmistress of North London Collegiate School

link_mentions.page: List of Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire
response: *1961: Kitty Anderson, Elizabeth Couchman, The Baroness Hornsby-Smith, Anne Stephens
